title: Extended Classic – Cosmic Queries: A Powerful Potpourri
description:
Neil deGrasse Tyson and Chuck Nice tackle an eclectic mix of your questions that take us from the boiling surface of the Sun to the dark side of the moon. Now extended with more questions on aliens, Isaac Newton as a dinner guest, Panspermia, and the James Webb Space Telescope.
NOTE: StarTalk All-Access subscribers can listen to this entire episode commercial-free here: https://www.startalkradio.net/all-access/extended-classic-cosmic-queries-a-powerful-potpourri/
Image Credit & Copyright: Bob Franke.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
